wikitext.*:
'''''ëar''''' means "sea" in [[Quenya]].<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''ëar''</ref> When capitalized, '''''Eär''''' refers to the "Great Sea",<ref>{{RK|VI5}}, [[Oath of Elendil]], p. 967</ref> i.e. ''[[Belegaer]]''.

==Examples==
* ''[[Eämbar|'''Eä'''mbar]]'' = "Sea-dwelling"
* ''[[Eärendil|'''Eär'''endil]]'' = "Sea-friend"
** ''[[Eärnil I|'''Eär'''nil]]'' (contraction)
* ''[[Eärendur (Lord of Andúnië)|Eärendur]]'' = "Sea-servant"
** ''[[Eärnur]]'' (contraction)
*''[[Eärrámë|'''Eär'''rámë]]'' = "Sea-wing"
* ''[[Eärwen|'''Eär'''wen]]'' = "Sea-maiden"

==Cognate==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[aer]]''
